name: Return To The Princess !
description:
--The Game:

Diego is a lazy Knight, who has to save his princess,

As gabriel his guardian angel you will have to help Him with your Time powers !

Diego, will run until his motivation has runned out. The time will stop if Diego is about to die, rewind the time, and try something else !

The world is moving too, understanding what will happen in the level will be the best way to figured out how to reach the princess.

--Controls:

"Echap" : Pause the game,

"A" : Rewind Diego

"E" : Rewind Level

--This Game has been created in one week in the occasion of the Brackeys' 2020.2 Game Jam

--Credits: 

.GameDesign, Graphics, Sound : Yoan Delalonde 

.GameProgramming : Anatole Todorov

.Musics from :

- Levels : https://www.bensound.com/

- Title screen:- Irish Coffee by Stefan Kartenberg (c) copyright 2020 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Noncommercial  (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/JeffSpeed68/61360
